resources.string: To help serious Japanese learner to learn effectively, I created this SMART JLPT N5 apps.
Learn by answering the question you have answered wrong
When I was learning Japanese, I realized that I have 2 big issues:
I cannot remember what I have learnt.
I waste too much time on non-productive activates. i.e. Spend too much time looking for answer and explanation. Not able to study what I need to know.

What it does:
We created a database of Japanese grammar exercise at JLPT N5 Level.
When you are free, just spend time answer 5 to 10 questions.
The app will remember which question you have answered wrong and it will ask you again until you can answer correctly for 3 times.
After you have answered the entire question database correctly for 3 times, you are ready for exam!
Know the basic of Japanese characters
Suggest using this app 6 to 12 months before JLPT N5 Exam
As a grammar refresher, to prepare for further Japanese study, i.e. N4
Learn\n- cover all the grammar you need to learn for JLPT N5 exam
Exam section 1\n- passed and simulated question for JLPT N5 grammar section 1
Exam section 2\n- passed and simulated question for JLPT N5 grammar section 2
Exam section 3\n- passed and simulated question for JLPT N5 grammar section 3
This feature will be available soon....
